question: As per the new budget of 2020-21 of Odisha, what is the increase in the estimated expenditure for 2020-21 with compare to the revised expenditure of 2019-20?
explanation: As per the new budget of 2020-21 of Odisha, the estimated expenditure for 2020-21 showed an increase of 11% with compare to the revised expenditure of 2019-20. The revised expenditure of 2019-20 is 2.9% lower than it was estimated.
